intro.description: Eclipse Hybrid Mobile tools uses Apache Cordova command line tools to build and manage cordova projects. This will guide you through the installation and configuration of the Cordova tools.

item.title: Install Node.js
item.description: Cordova command line tools require node.js to run. Download and install Node.js. Following installation, you should be able to invoke "node" and "npm" on your command line.

item.title: Install Cordova
item.description: Install the cordova module using npm utility of Node.js. The cordova module will automatically be downloaded by the npm utility. Install cordova using npm command "npm install -g cordova"
